author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam meets Riley Kolbow (aka @worksbydesign ), the designer and inventor of the transforming chess pieces that recently vent viral on YouTube! Riley visits the cave to show Adam how his mechanical pawns work and blows our minds with how he engineered, iterated, and manufactured these pieces. 

Watch Riley's Works By Design videos about his transforming chess pieces: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CSOnnle3zbA and find more of his videos at @worksbydesign 

Shot and edited by Joey Fameli
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Stunned By These Transforming Chess Pieces!
